text.autoconfig.renlava.option.obsidianM: Number of "stacks" each Obsidian adds. To fill a Crucible 4 "stacks" is needed. Default: 1
text.autoconfig.renlava.option.blazePowd: Number of "stacks" each Blaze Powder adds. To fill a Crucible 16 "stacks" is needed. Default: 1
text.autoconfig.renlava.option.lavaConve: Modifier which adjusts the chance of converting Obsidian to Lava. Default: 1
